attributes.action: Enforce 20 mph speed limit and speed bumps on Whitehorse Hill / Red Hill Chislehurst Kent
attributes.additional_details: Stop the accidents and deaths caused by speeding and dangerous driving on Whitehorse Hill / Red Hill. On this stretch of road we have main bus routes, three doctors, and a large primary school. Over the last two weeks there have been two serious accidents resulting in the road being closed for several hours, Sadly one resulted in a death. The road is used as a speed way and needs to have a lower speed limit and speed reduction enforced.
